Detailed Description

This class provides the public APIs to control the Bluetooth A2DP profile.

BluetoothA2dp is a proxy object for controlling the Bluetooth A2DP Service via IPC. Use getProfileProxy to get the BluetoothA2dp proxy object. GAIA only supports one connected Bluetooth A2dp device at a time.
